title: Timmy's Actually a Meany-Head
description: He never let's me finish my sentences and he won't stop hitting me with my own hand.

title: Unusual Working Conditions
description: Mr. Nook won't stop laughing at his own terrible jokes; and I can't open the windows. Talk about fire-hazard!

title: Strange New Coworker
description: I like Brooster and all, but I'm concerned about his coffee-creamer sources. Pigeons? What?! Whoooo?

title: Social Distancing Sadness
description: Ever since the beginning of November I feel like I barely talk half what I used to to interact with our human. I feel my vocabulary going extinct.

title: Ordinances
description: RED ALERT! Please do not encourage the human to enact the pretty island ordinance. It's a flower-pocolypse!
